SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302project
Package com.example.cab302project.model

Interface IAssignmentDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockAssignmentDAO, SqliteAssignmentDAO
public interface IAssignmentDAO
IAssignmentDAO for managing assignments in a data access object (DAO) or MockAssignmentDAO. Provides a contract for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving assignments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAssignment(Assignment assignment)
    Adds a new assignment to the data source.

    Deletes an assignment from the data source.

    Retrieves all assignments in the data source.

    Searches for assignments that contain the specified keyword in their name.

  • Method Details

    • addAssignment

      void addAssignment(Assignment assignment)
      Adds a new assignment to the data source.
      Parameters:
      assignment - The Assignment object to be added.

    • updateAssignment

      void updateAssignment(Assignment assignment)
      Updates an existing assignment in the data source.
      Parameters:
      assignment - The Assignment object containing updated information.

    • deleteAssignment

      void deleteAssignment(Assignment assignment)
      Deletes an assignment from the data source.
      Parameters:
      assignment - The Assignment object to be deleted.

    • getAssignment

      Assignment getAssignment(int id)
      Retrieves a specific assignment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the assignment to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Assignment object if found, or null if not.

    • getAllAssignments

      List<Assignment> getAllAssignments(String username)
      Retrieves all assignments in the data source.
      Returns:
      A list of all Assignment objects.

    • searchAssignments

      List<Assignment> searchAssignments(String keyword)
      Searches for assignments that contain the specified keyword in their name.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in assignment names.
      Returns:
      A list of assignments that match the search criteria.
